name: Softengi
description:
Softengi is a software development company listed as one of the top 100 world's IT outsourcing service providers by IAOP.
We cover the most popular technological stacks in software development using such programming languages as C#, Java, JavaScript, Angular.JS, C/C++, .NET, ASP.NET, etc. 

Apart from core expertise, we use top-notch technologies, such as AI, IoT, AR/VR/MR. Blockchain, and Gamification as we believe that these innovative solutions give tangible results and help companies to grow at the speed of light. 

We see digitalization as our mission and a corporate philosophy. 
We have all the resources required for the digital transformation of any business: over 400 professionals working in 9 Softengi offices worldwide and a huge expertise in software technologies. 
Our team has proven expertise and experience to provide services such as:
•    Digital Transformation Consulting. We generate ideas using a thorough business analysis.
•    Custom Software Development;
•    Software Testing (QA);
•    UI/UX Design;
Softengi professionals are ready to orchestrate your digital transformation!
